title: Data analysis and patterns recognition
description: First questions to answer  What does a instance represent in each dataset? Dimensions of each dataset  Conclusions  What features are available in the dataset? What features are categorical ? Classify samples. Could be Nominal - Ordinal - Ratios - Intervals What features are numerical ? Values discrete, continuous, time-series Which features may contain errors ? Which features contain blank, nulls or empty values ? What are the data types for the features ? Distribution of numerical features ? Distribution of categorical features ?  Assumptions  Data assumptions  Drops and create ️ Could you drop some features ?
description_lemmatized: first question answer instance represent dataset dimension dataset conclusion feature available dataset feature categorical classify sample could nominal ordinal ratio interval feature numerical value discrete continuous timeseries feature may contain error feature contain blank null empty value data type feature distribution numerical feature distribution categorical feature assumption data assumption drop create could drop feature
